name: WC Give a Coupon
author: GGFat

sections.description:
This plugin automatically offers a discount coupon for every purchase made by setting a expiration date in days.
This plugin manages to automatically give customers a coupon for each purchase they do so as to entice them to make the next purchase. You can set the discount percentage, the days of validity, the description of the coupon and you can send everything via email. Then you can enter the subject and body of the email.

Truly wonderful.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Can the coupon be sent by email?

Yes, the coupon can be sent via email.

Can a conditional amount be entered for orders?

Yes, you can enter a conditional amount for orders.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Launch!

1.1

Added the ability to enter a conditional amount for orders

short_description: A plugin that automatically offers a discount coupon for every purchase made by setting a deadline.
